reporter_caption.center: CONARD v. QUAKERTOWN HOSPITAL, 292 Pa. Super. 578 (1981)

caption.center: Conard et al., Appellants v. Quakertown Hospital et al.

opinion.posture: Civil proceedings. Trespass. Before BECKERT, J. No. 2247 Oct. T., 1979. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Bucks County, No. 78-95903-2. Argued September 9, 1980.
